::DarkMouse:;

Her whole body trembled with fear as she looked at 
Starscream. "I..I..I did come clean.  I did leave Megatron.  I knew 
inferno from when I was still with Megatron.  I was sent on a suicide 
mission and didn't know it.  I then served under Black Aracnia.  I 
got..." she didn't want to tell him of her death and come back 
experience." I got hurt and then I left Black Aracnia.  i was just 
running through the forest when Inferno flew by and found me.  he 
told me that Megatron was now dead.  he wasnted to take me back to 
the Aracnia's base, but...but..I didn't want to go....and that's when 
you and your friend jumped us.  I didn't do anything."  Her voice was 
starting to choke as the tears ran down her face.  "I don't know what 
happened to Megatron.  All I know is that Inferno told me he was 
dead." She covered her face with her hands.  She fell to her knees 
and cried. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream shook his head at the mouse.
> 
> "Join the club. Megatron has tried to kill a lot of people. But how 
> do I believe you? You were talking with Inferno. Inferno works for 
> Megatron. If Megatron really wnated you dead, Inferno would have 
> killed you. You know something and this is your last chance to come 
> clean!"
